fqTitle: Will a House Democratic Leader call for President Joe Biden to step down as the Democratic nominee for president this month?
fqBody: This question will resolve as Yes if, by July 31, 2024, a House Democratic Leader publicly calls for President Joe Biden to step down as the Democratic nominee for president. A "House Democratic Leader" is defined as a member of the House Democratic leadership team, including the Speaker, Majority Leader, Majority Whip, or any other member of the leadership team. The call must be explicit and made in a public forum, such as an official speech, published article, or a verified social media post. The call must be reported by at least two reputable news organizations (BBC, The Guardian, New York Times, Washington Post). In the event of ambiguous statements, the resolution will be based on the consensus interpretation by these reporting news organizations. This question resolves as YES upon confirmation of such a call.
